abstract.t: This draft describes a VPN Tunnel encapsulation shim header (VTE) to beused in VPN tunnels and also defines a simple tunnel signaling protocol,called VPN Tunneling Protocol (VTP). It provides a simple mechanism forcarrying VPN traffic over provider backbone. The protocol is expected tobe run at each of the PE routers in the provider backbone. Remote accessnodes can also join the VPN using this protocol.
